https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tnaxD8SXI0zjaB0VMNBz0T6RN0o.jpg In the United States of America, lobbyists, corporations and billionaires invest millions of dollars to ensure that a suitable candidate, one inclined to support their personal ambitions and economic projects, wins an election, which inevitably affects everything, from the selection of local officials to presidential elections, creates countless conflicts of interest and undermines what supposedly used to be a model democracy. Democracy for $ale
